PHRASE.LANG: When worn in Spunland enables the wearer to plant up to 3 seeds on available spunpatches. [#Legal]
Bei Benutzung in Spunland kann der Träger bis zu 3 Samen in verfügbare Spun-Plätze pflanzen. [#Legal]
When worn in Spunland enables the wearer to plant up to 3 seeds on available spunpatches. [#Legal]
When worn in Spunland enables the wearer to plant up to 3 seeds on available spunpatches. [#Legal]
Al llevarla en Spunland, permite al portador plantar hasta 3 semillas en los parterres Spun disponibles. [#Legal]
Ceux qui la portent dans Spunland pourront planter jusqu'à 3 graines dans les emplacements Spun disponibles. [#Legal]
Quando indossata a Spunland, permette a chi la porta di piantare fino a 3 semi in zone di terra spun disponibili. [#Legal]
